elements.name: used_fp_method
elements.title: Have you ever used a modern family planning method?

elements.name: using_fp_method
elements.title: Are you currently using a modern family planning method?

choices.text: Combined oral contraceptive / Empeke ezilimu ebirungo ebigatiddwa
Progesterone only pills / Empeke ezilumu ekilungo ekimu

elements.name: Info2
elements.html:
Educate the client about the family planning methods and possible side effects.

Options: Combined oral contraceptive / progesterone only pills / depo (injectable) / syana press / implants / condoms / IUD (coil) / tubal ligation / LAM (Lactational amenorrhea) / Calendar (cycle beads)

Yigiriza buli azze okufuna obuwereza entekateka z'ezadde n'ebiyinza okutukako nga ozikozeseza.

Empeke ezilimu ebirungo ebigatiddwa/Empeke ezilumu ekilungo ekimu/Empiso ya depo/Empiso ya sayana/implants/Obupiira/Akaweta/Okusala ensekke/Okuyonsa kwokka/Okubala enakku z'omweezi/n'endala

elements.name: partner_yesno
elements.title: Was the partner included in the health education session?

elements.name: accept_fp_method
elements.title: Does the client accept to take a FP method?

elements.name: switch_fp_method
elements.title: Does the client want to switch to another FP method?
elements.description: Eyazze yandiyadde okudda kuntekateka y'ezadde endala?

elements.name: info5
elements.html:
<hr>Thank the client for their time, and follow-up after 30 days
</hr><hr>Webazze azze olw'obudde,era omukeberekko oluvanyuma lw'enakku amakumi asatu.</hr>

elements.name: choose_new_fp_method
elements.title: Which FP method does the client want to use?
elements.description: Kika kki eky'entekateka y'ezadde  eyazze ky'ayagala?

choices.text: Combined oral contraceptive / Empeke ezilimu ebirungo ebigatiddwa
Progesterone only pills / Empeke ezilumu ekilungo ekimu

elements.name: oral_pills_given
elements.title: Did you deliver the Combined oral contraception pills?

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Did you deliver the Sayana Press?

elements.name: info6-2
elements.html: <hr>Remind the client that a follow-up needs to be done when refill is needed</hr><hr>Jjukiza azze nti okugobererwa kulina okolebwa w'aba alina okwongerayo empereza.</hr>

elements.name: info6-3
elements.visibleIf: {choose_new_fp_method} = 'item2' or {choose_new_fp_method} = 'item3' or {choose_new_fp_method} = 'item6' or {choose_new_fp_method} = 'item7' or {choose_new_fp_method} = 'item8' or {choose_new_fp_method} = 'item9' or {choose_new_fp_method} = 'item10'
elements.html:
<hr>Refer to the health facility for other options
</hr><hr>Ddala muwereze kuddwaliro erikuli okumpi.</hr>
